title: Front-End Development
description: Learn to build beautiful and interactive user interfaces with React, Angular, and Vue.

title: Back-End Development
description: Master server-side logic, databases, and APIs using technologies like Node.js, Python, and .NET.

title: Full Stack Development
description: Become a versatile developer by learning both front-end and back-end technologies.

title: Data Science
description: Dive into data analysis, machine learning, and visualization with Python, R, and SQL.

title: AI Engineer
description: Explore the frontiers of artificial intelligence, deep learning, and neural networks.

title: DevOps
description: Learn to streamline software development and operations with CI/CD, Docker, and Kubernetes.
